fields.headline: Inexpensive hostels in Seville
fields.bodyText: · The Hostal Atenas (Caballerizas 1 Seville 41003, tel: +95 421 8047, email: hst.atenas@terra.es, doubles euros 51, singles euros 27) is in the old city, about five minutes from the cathedral and the Alcazar. It is a safe area at night, I was not pestered either on the street or in the bar. Ruth Wyman · I stayed last year at the Pension Vergara (+95 421 5668) for euros 16 a night. It has six rooms around a 15th-century patio, in the centre of the best part of Seville, the Barrio de Santa Cruz. James Wiltshire
